channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: Some Mi'kmaw knowledge keepers and botanists in Cape Breton are making it their mission to share the healing power of plants; they say learning about Mi'kmaw medicine is a way to connect generations.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: CBC Arts: Exhibitionists
channel.desc: An artist spreads joy on Instagram; a man builds a collection of kitsch; a DIY bath bomb.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Anna and Edward learn new skills during a new poolside project; Ben and Vanessa start turning an old laundry into a cinema, gym and games room; Belinda and Lee take on their biggest project yet.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: FIVB Volleyball Women's Nations League - Women's: Canada vs. United States
channel.desc: The annual women's international volleyball tournament contested by 16 national teams.
